Windlord/Nighlight:

"Aerotaur... " said worried Windlord, he was knee down looking 
Nightlight "It's Nightlight... She's... severely hurted... She'll 
have to stay a while in cr... I think that Gramps should be locked 
down somewhere, I have the bad feeling  that if we don't find a way 
to stop him, this drama will end in a tragedy... for him or for her"

Windlord picked up Nightlight, before he left the place he looked to 
Aerotaur and said "I'll be back"

Windlord left the room and walked to crs
